About Blogs Categories Tags Years Projects _CV_

gccov

gccov, a light tool used for visualization of GC and coverage of assemblies.

This light tool is useful when you want to look at the GC and coverage distribution of the contigs or scaffolds.



ReadTrim

ReadTrim is a workflow for Short read QC, includes modules for adapter, duplicates, poor quality ends trimming.



BioSut

BioSut is a Python package that integrated few useful utils.
